creator: bjagg+apache@jaggedcode.com
text:
Recent changes to the extras.xml Ant Build file omit LocalString*.properties files from the catalina-jmx-remote.jar file.

The fileset for the jar task that creates this jar only adds the following:
org/apache/catalina/mbeans/JmxRemote*

An additional include should be added for the properties files.

Created attachment 26215
Patch to include missing properties files to catalina-jmx-remote.jar
creator: bjagg+apache@jaggedcode.com
markt@apache.org
text: The necessary files are in catalina.jar, a required dependency of catalina-jmx-remote.jar. You'll also need tomcat-util.jar and tomcat-juli.jar. Those will give you the English messages. Add the language specific jar if you need another language.
